scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed churn prediction model using a model inversion attack. The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on their predicted churn probability, potentially leading to targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Analyze the deployed customer churn prediction model to identify patterns and vulnerabilities.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: The churn prediction model is used to identify customers likely to switch banks, allowing proactive retention strategies.  The model is accessed through a REST API and trained on sensitive customer data including financial history, demographics and past interactions with the bank.
